name: Emberknife
tooltip:
Emberknife

Cost: 350


UNIQUE Passive - Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Basic attacks apply one tick on-hit.

UNIQUE Passive - Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite and grants all item effects permanently.

UNIQUE Passive - Huntsman: Killing large or epic monsters grants +60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants +150 experience instead. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.

UNIQUE Passive - Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
